entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
